news.title: 邮件证实安德鲁王子与爱泼斯坦案受害者合影为真
news.title0: Email appears to confirm Andrew and Virginia Giuffre photo is real
news.content: 最新披露的爱泼斯坦文件显示，一封据称来自吉斯莱恩·麦克斯韦的邮件证实，安德鲁王子与指控其性侵的弗吉尼亚·朱弗雷的合影是真实的。
news.content0: An email seemingly from Ghislaine Maxwell appears to confirm that a photograph of Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor with his arm around Virginia Giuffre, who accused him of sexual abuse, is real.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普呼吁美国“翻篇”爱泼斯坦案
news.title0: Trump says America should move on from Epstein - it may not be that easy
news.content: 特朗普总统表示国家应“翻篇”爱泼斯坦案，但国会调查仍在继续，受害者要求更多文件披露，此事难以平息。
news.content0: Over the past two months, the US Department of Justice has released millions of documents related to its sex-trafficking investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. Now, the president wants the nation to move on - but will it?
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美最高法院允许加州使用有利民主党新版选区地图
news.title0: Supreme Court allows California to use new voting map boosting Democrats
news.content: 美国最高法院为加州使用有利于民主党的新版国会选区地图扫清障碍，该党有望在中期选举中增加最多五个席位。
news.content0: The US Supreme Court has cleared the way for California to use a new voting map that favours Democrats, paving the way for the party to gain up to five congressional seats this year.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 梅琳达·盖茨称爱泼斯坦文件勾起痛苦婚姻回忆
news.title0: 'Painful times in my marriage' - Melinda French Gates reacts to ex-husband in Epstein files
news.content: 梅琳达·盖茨表示，前夫比尔·盖茨出现在爱泼斯坦文件中，勾起了她婚姻中“非常痛苦的时光”的回忆。
news.content0: Billionaire philanthropist Melinda French Gates has said her ex-husband, Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, being named in new files relating to the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein dredged up "painful times in my marriage".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 罗马教堂天使壁画因酷似意总理被涂改
news.title0: Church fresco resembling Italian PM has face scrubbed out
news.content: 罗马一座教堂壁画中天使的面部因酷似意大利总理梅洛尼引发争议，艺术家在梵蒂冈要求下将其涂掉，将恢复原貌。
news.content0: The face of an angel on a restored church fresco in Rome that sparked outrage because of its likeness to Italy's prime minister, has been crudely scrubbed out by the artist who painted it.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 男子因2024年企图刺杀特朗普被判终身监禁
news.title0: Man sentenced to life in prison for 2024 attempt on Trump's life
news.content: 瑞安·劳斯因2024年在佛罗里达州高尔夫球场企图刺杀时任总统候选人特朗普，被判处终身监禁。
news.content0: Ryan Routh has been sentenced to life in prison for attempting to assassinate President Donald Trump on a Florida golf course in September of 2024.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 挪威王储之子庭审中落泪，承认生活糜烂
news.title0: Son of Norway's crown princess holds back tears giving evidence at rape trial
news.content: 挪威王储之子在强奸案庭审中落泪，承认自己因极度渴望认可而过着派对、毒品和酒精充斥的生活。
news.content0: The son of Norway's crown princess has told a court in Oslo he has lived a life of partying out of an extreme need of validation, on the second day of his trial for rape and more than 30 other alleged offences.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 《华盛顿邮报》宣布大规模裁员，缩减新闻覆盖
news.title0: Washington Post announces sweeping layoffs, scaling back news coverage
news.content: 《华盛顿邮报》宣布裁员三分之一，将大幅缩减体育和国际新闻的报道规模，以应对业务挑战。
news.content0: The Washington Post has announced it is laying off one-third of its work force, sharply scaling back the paper's coverage of sports and foreign news.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 荷兰王后马克西玛参军，以支持本国武装力量
news.title0: Dutch Queen Joins Armed Forces in Symbolic Move of Support for Military
news.content: 荷兰王后马克西玛以预备役身份加入荷兰陆军，象征性地支持本国武装力量，响应欧洲加强防务的呼声。
news.content0: Queen Máxima of the Netherlands has enlisted in the Dutch Army as a reservist, as countries across Europe aim to strength their armed forces to reduce the continent’s military dependence on the United States.
news.author: NYTimes
